funCards.title: Tic Tac Toe with AI
funCards.description: Play a game of Tic Tac Toe against an AI opponent. Click on this card to start playing!

achievements: Scored enough grades in High School to not be disowned by family
Scored enough grades during Entrance Exams to not be thrown out of the Engineering race
